data/wiki/graphics/drawing/pen-fill.md

# Pen & Fill Reference for Vista Graphics pen and fill styles. ## Pen Styles - **pen**: Set outline color/style - **pen-width**: Set outline width - **pen-cap**: Set line cap style - **pen-join**: Set line join style ## Fill Styles - **fill**: Set fill color/style - **no-fill**: Disable fill ## Example `draw canvas [ pen red pen-width 3 fill blue box 10 10 100 100 ]` ## Line Caps - **butt**: Flat end - **round**: Round end - **square**: Square end ## Line Joins - **miter**: Sharp corner - **round**: Round corner - **bevel**: Beveled corner ## See Also - [Colors](/wiki/graphics/colors/) - Color reference - [Primitives](/wiki/graphics/drawing/primitives/) - Drawing primitives
